content:
I am interested in the evolution of our society towards ecological, energetic and economic sustainability. I can contribute a deep ecological thinking, economic interest and many years of data-science, project-management and problem-solving experience.
Ecology, Energy and Economy - hand in hand; is our only chance!
Please use the icons on the left to navigate to specific topics, such as my scientific output, software, CV and social platforms.
